Production Deploy Status

ShapeShift

Project Dependencies

  • Python 3.11 or newer
  • NodeJS 18 or newer

Running the dev environment

Backend

Setup

**Optional: Create python virtual environment

From the \backend directory:

python3 -m venv venv

To start the virtual environment (run every time you run the dev env)

Mac:

source venv/bin/activate

Windows:

.\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1

Install dependencies 

pip install -r requirements.txt

Setup environment variables

.env file should be located in backend directory

# Mongo
USR="username"
PW="password"

# JWT secrets
JWT_SECRET_KEY="key"
JWT_REFRESH_SECRET_KEY="key"
ALGORITHM="algo"

# For local dev
HOST=localhost
PORT=8000

OPENAI_API_KEY="key"

Run the server 

# check dir
# cd backend
python3 main.py

Navigate to http://localhost:8000

Frontend

Setup

Install dependencies

npm install

Run the expo app 

npm run start

## You can also run directly on your machine
# npm run web
# npm run ios
# npm run android

Scan the qr code to access the expo app on your phone
